transcript:
Customer: Jai jai ma jai jai ma
(Music)
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Good morning sir, main Aishwarya baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se senior manager. Kal ke naam se aapne ko time diya tha.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Actually sir wo na kal pooja ke sath apna ek meeting hua tha, aap hi ke sath hua tha?
Customer: Nahi pooja ke sath jinka meeting hua unka main number deta hu, kyuki main abhi cricket match me hu, wo coordinate karenge aap se.
Executive: Ji wo coordinate karenge. Reason ye tha bas call karne ka ki meeting ke baad na ek feedback message jata hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji wo aaya hai. Satisfied nahi hai na boss hum honestly kyuki hum log kaisa aapne humko trust dilaya humne package activate kare hum jab lead lene ja rahe hai koi bolta humko hazar juta chahiye hazar jute ke lead pe par click kar rahe hai to bol rahe do bol raha aapko ek hi juta chahiye.
Customer: Kam se kam aise dedh 200 lead aise hi hamare waste ho gaye hai.
Executive: Nahi to is cheez pe ab problem ye hai na ki is cheez pe meeting kal kisi aur person se hui feedback aapke paas gaya aur aapne feedback diya to wo jo feedback main dunga na sir kyuki main owner hu na.
Executive: Obviously sir to fir main mujhe baat bhi fir aap hi se karni padegi na service ko leke.
Customer: Nahi nahi manage manage jo kar rahe usse baat karna padega na.
Executive: To sir jo manage kar rahe usse to kal kal maine video meeting kara di proper.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aur jo jo unhone issue video meeting ho hi nahi sakti possible hi nahi video meeting hui nahi.
Executive: Kal karai hai sir ab aapko nahi pata hai to unse.
Customer: Video meeting hui nahi sir ji.
Executive: Sir agar aapko nahi pata hai to kitna minute hua hai.
Customer: Paanch se 10 minute na. Thik hai ek bar aap coordinate kar lo unse sir ji main unka number aapko bhejta hu thik hai.
Executive: Ye IndiaMART me added hai number unka?
Customer: Added hai na sir unko ek bar coordinate kar lijiye sir aap please.
Executive: 499 wala.
Executive: Ji ji please please sir.
Customer: Thik hai main thank you thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with lead quality after package activation.

- Leads are not matching requirements.

- Wasted leads due to inaccurate information.



Resolution:

- Executive will share the concerned person's number.

- Asked the customer to coordinate with them.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, meeting, feedback, coordination
